amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to make U.S. territories eligible for additional Safe Drinking Water Act funding to address emerging contaminants including PFAS.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to make U.S. territories eligible for additional Safe Drinking Water Act funding to address emerging contaminants including PFAS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
